attributes.action: Protect rights of British Citizens, living in EU countries in post Brexit talks.
attributes.additional_details: The continuance of the right to free healthcare and annual pension increases is essential in order for most ex-pat pensioners to survive.  Many cannot afford to  uproot and return  to the UK.
attributes.background: People took up their rights to live and work abroad, now the rug is being pulled from under them and they are terribly worried.
